description: Today's Chip of the Day celebrates the rich Afrikaner culinary heritage with our Ginger Rooibos potato chips.

Event: National Day (Bhutan)
Chip: Bhutanese Chili

In honor of Bhutan's vibrant National Day celebrations, our Bhutanese Chili potato chips offer a bold and fiery tribute to the country's rich culinary heritage.
Celebrating National Day (Qatar), we're spotlighting our Garlic Clove potato chips today.
